original_text:
But he would feed you with the finest of the wheat,
    and with honey from the rock I would satisfy you.”
korean_text: 또 내가 기름진 밀을 그들에게 먹이며 반석에서 나오는 꿀로 너를 만족하게 하리라 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: But he would feed you with the finest of the wheat
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 너희를 가장 좋은 밀로 먹이리라

sentences.original_text: and with honey from the rock I would satisfy you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 반석에서 나는 꿀로 내가 너희를 만족시키리라
